doc.after: Kurdistan is a roughly defined geo cultural region wherein the Kurdish people form a prominent majority population and Kurdish culture language and national identity have historically been based Contemporary use of Kurdistan refers to large parts of eastern Turkey Turkish Kurdistan northwestern Iran Iranian Kurdistan northerneastern Iraq Iraqi Kurdistan and a smaller part in northeastern Syria Rojava inhabited mainly by Kurds Kurdistan roughly encompasses the northwestern Zagros and the eastern Taurus mountain ranges
